text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump #TrumpGate can be so many things
• Massive and deadly COVID-19 outbreak mismanagement
• Gutting the public sphere
• Money laundering for Russia
• Tax fraud combined with banking fraud
• Parade of sexual assault allegations
• Working with Russians to influence the election
